name: Orbisius Theme Fixer
author: Orbisius.com

sections.description:
Support

Support is handled on our site: http://club.orbisius.com/
Please do NOT use the WordPress forums or other places to seek support.

This plugin allows you to recover your site if a theme crashed it. When the plugin is active it will reset the theme and you’ll.
sections.installation:
You will have to upload this plugin into wp-content/mu-plugins folder. If it doesn’t exist create it. Then the plugin will take over and will use one of the default WordPress themes.

Features

  • It’s a little plugin that overrides your theme

Usage

  1. Unzip,
  2. Upload the plugin on your server,
  3. Change the theme to something else
  4. Delete this plugin

Demo

n/a

Support

  • Support is handled on our site: http://club.orbisius.com/support/
  • Please do NOT use the WordPress forums or other places to seek support.

Author

Do you need an amazing plugin created especially for your needs? Contact me. Svetoslav Marinov (Slavi) | Custom Web and Mobile Programming by Orbisius.com

Troubleshooting

If you site becomes broken due to a child theme (mis)configuration. Please check another plugin of ours: Orbisius Theme Fixer

http://club.orbisius.com/products/wordpress-plugins/orbisius-theme-fixer/You will need to have an FTP client installed.

  1. Unzip the package, and upload orbisius-theme-fixer to the /wp-content/mu-plugins/ directory if the folder mu-plugins doesn’t exist create it.
  2. Login into your WordPress admin
sections.faq:
What to do next?

Go to http://club.orbisius.com and post suggestions in our forum for new features that you’d like to see in this plugin or its extensions.

short_description: This plugin helps you recover your site if it was crashed by a theme. It works by reseting your theme (tmp) to one of the default WordPress ones
